headline: Fitch Affirms Dominion Energy's and Subsidiaries' IDRs
summary: Fitch Ratings has affirmed Dominion Energy, Inc.'s Long-Term Issuer Default Rating at 'BBB+' and the IDRs of Virginia Electric and Power Co. and Dominion Energy South Carolina, Inc. at 'A-'.The...
